theme: Empowering Innovation for a Sustainable Future
targetAudience: Innovators, Startups, Investors, Students, and Development Partners

hackathon.title: Hackathons at SwahiliPot
about: SwahiliPot Hub hosts exciting hackathons that bring together talented developers, designers, and innovators from across Mombasa and beyond. These intensive coding events foster creativity, collaboration, and technological solutions to local and global challenges.

Our hackathons typically run over 24-48 hours, where participants form teams to conceptualize and build innovative projects. With mentorship from industry experts and access to SwahiliPot's resources, participants transform ideas into functional prototypes.

Past hackathons have focused on themes like sustainable development, healthcare innovation, and digital solutions for local businesses. These events have launched numerous startups and continue to nurture the next generation of tech talent on the Kenyan coast.

pitches.title: Smart Water Monitoring
pitches.description: A real-time IoT solution for monitoring water usage and quality in coastal communities.

pitches.title: Blue Economy Marketplace
pitches.description: A digital platform connecting local fishermen and artisans to buyers, promoting sustainable trade.

pitches.title: Eco-Tourism App
pitches.description: A mobile app that curates eco-friendly tourism experiences along the Kenyan coast.
